abstractText: A Nepalese paper manuscript containing a Pañcarākṣa dhāraṇī Collections, consisting of the 5 usual dhāraṇīs and two additional texts: Mahāpratisarā, Mahāsagasrapramardanī, Mahāmāyūrī, Kurukullā, Caṇḍamahāroṣaṇa, Mahāśitavatī, Mahāmantrānusāriṇī.
abstractShort: A Nepalese paper manuscript containing a Pañcarākṣa dhāraṇī Collections, consisting of the 5 usual dhāraṇīs and two additional
title: Pañcarākṣa dhāraṇī Collections
